Re: Atrocious and deplorable conduct on the part of your PTA President

Dear Mrs Green,

As a member of the public who cares deeply about education, I was outraged to hear from the news today that the President of your school’s Parent Teachers’ Association, Kwan Kar Wong, also a member of the Hong Kong Police Force, committed a heinous crime against a young person.

Good Hope School has always enjoyed the positive public reputation of upholding the core values of Love, Hope, Joy and Thanksgiving. Students of your school are educated to follow the teachings of the Bible so that they will become well-rounded critical thinkers and apt leaders of future society.

The values of your school, unfortunately, have been challenged unprecedentedly in the morning of 11th November 2019 at Sai Wan Ho, where an unarmed young man was shot at his abdomen at close range by a police officer, followed by two more live bullet-rounds. And this police officer, as shown from the footage, was none other than Mr Kwan himself.

From the news video footage, it was clear that the Mr Kwan was not placed under a life-threatening situation. The 21-year-old severely wounded by Mr Kwan had suffered a cardiac arrest during surgery, and he remains in critical condition, according to the Hong Kong Hospital Authority.

Should Mr Kwan be allowed to remain in the position of PTA President, this would definitely cast doubt on Good Hope School’s ability to provide a loving, caring and unbiased environment for educating our younger generation. Should this not be done in time, Good Hope School’s reputation will be irrevocably tarnished.

Therefore, we hereby call for a review on the properness of Mr Kwan Kar Wing as an executive committee member and the Chairperson of the Good Hope School (GHS) Parent Teacher Association (PTA) and strongly demand that your school immediately condemn and disqualify Mr Kwan Kar Wing from his position as Chairperson of GHS PTA.

Regards,
A concerned citizen
